text: Congratulations to Canada on this important step forward. Now it is time for us to stand up to the NRA and do the same. We must ban the sale, distribution and transfer of assault weapons in the United States. https://twitter.com/nytimes/status/1256283265377411072 QT @nytimes Canada banned all military-style assault weapons, nearly 2 weeks after the country’s deadliest mass shooting. The ban took effect immediately. https://trib.al/witGyJE

Incredible news. I introduced the National Domestic Workers Bill of Rights and I’m proud to see Philadelphia leading the charge in their state. Domestic workers, many of whom are women of color and immigrants, deserve basic protections—especially in times like these. https://twitter.com/domesticworkers/status/1256244283105042439 QT @domesticworkers We organized, we lobbied, and TODAY the country’s most innovative #DomesticWorkersBillofRights went into effect in Philadelphia! Domestic workers care for the people of our city, and it’s time for our city to care for them. #MayDay http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EW8TwNPWsAQf1b6.png https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1256243098600050688/vid/480x270/VTENSKze-W5Pc9eR.mp4?tag=13

#COVID19 is spreading like wildfire in our prisons and Congress hasn’t done nearly enough to stop it. We need more testing and to move vulnerable people in jail to supervision to save lives.
